seo.title: Filecoin Plus
seo.description: Filecoin Plus is a social layer mechanism that incentivizes all participants to make Filecoin more useful.

unverified.tooltip: Optionally, you can get DataCap even faster by performing KYC verification through Togggle. KYC is not required. However, applicants that have passed KYC are more likely to be approved quickly. Youâ€™ll only need to perform KYC once. It will be applied to every application you make moving forward. |Start_kyc_link|.

verifying.tooltip: It looks like your KYC verification is currently in progress. |Check_status_link| by entering the email you used for your submission.

failure_original_message.tooltip: You are not eligible for KYC verification at this time. If you feel that this is a mistake, please |reach_out_link| to the Filecoin plus team.

failure.tooltip: You attempted but failed KYC. Please |try_again_link| or |reach_out_link| for more information. The most likely reasons for failing are due to poor lighting or bad/blurry photos.

success.tooltip: Thanks for being a verified user of the Filecoin Plus program. Being verified means faster approvals and shorter time to DataCap.

copyright.text:
The Filecoin+ program applies the Filecoin Foundation privacy policies. Your participation in Filecoin+
serves as your acknowledgement and acceptance of these policies.

forms.tooltip_greater_than_15pib_text: You can use this field to enter a custom value that's more than 15 PiB. Please account all the DataCap you will need for your project.

description.loggedOut: Log in and share your contact information if you would like additional support with the onboarding process and/or share product feedback with the client growth team. All fields must be filled out to opt in.
description.notOptedIn: Please share the following information if you would like additional support with the onboarding process and/or share product feedback with the client growth team. All 3 fields must be filled out to opt in.
description.optedIn: In order to opt out, please get in touch with the client success team member that you've been in touch with.

validationMessage.chars: Input must be between 2 and 35 characters
Input must be between 2 and 35 characters
Input must be between 2 and 100 characters
